pages.text: The main power source for all Ancient Machines, except the Ancient Oven, is the $(bold)Encased Core$(). It comes in various tiers, each with their own efficiencies and durability.$(br2)Encased Cores are temporary, albeit long-lasting, and cannot be refilled. For now, you should only create one.

To create the base Encased Core, simply cook an Eye of Ender in an Ancient Oven. It takes a significantly long time, but it is not very draining on the machine, so you can make quite a few before having to repair it.

pages.title: Reference Pages
pages.text: Visit the Catalog to learn more about the different Encased Cores and how to use them.
